tika-abh06t23:3_0: Etesu yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t23:5_0: Imesu pana catūsu maggañāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā, tesaṁ pahānamevaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t23:6_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṁyojanāni nāma.
tika-abh06t23:7_2: lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappanti.
tika-abh06t23:8_2: micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṁ micchāvimuttīti.
tika-abh06t23:9_0: Lokadhammāti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṁsā sukhaṁ dukkhanti.
tika-abh06t23:9_1: Idha pana kāraṇūpacārena lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa, alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṁ lokadhammagahaṇena gahaṇaṁ katanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t23:10_0: Macchariyānīti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṁ kulamacchariyaṁ lābhamacchariyaṁ dhammamacchariyaṁ vaṇṇamacchariyanti.
tika-abh06t23:10_1: Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṁ sādhāraṇabhāvaṁ asahanākārena pavattāni macchariyāni.
tika-abh06t23:11_0: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu ‘‘niccaṁ sukhaṁ attā subha’’nti evaṁ pavattā saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti ime tayo vipallāsā.
tika-abh06t23:12_0: Ganthāti cattāro ganthā abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo, sīlabbataparāmāso, idaṁsaccābhiniveso kāyaganthoti.
tika-abh06t23:15_2: pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṁ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.
tika-abh06t23:16_0: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.
tika-abh06t23:17_0: Etesaṁ saṁyojanādīnaṁ etāni yathāsambhavaṁ pahānakarāni. Kathaṁ?
tika-abh06t23:17_1: Saṁyojanesu tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā apāyagamanīyā kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, sesā kāmarāgapaṭighā oḷārikā dutiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, sukhumā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, rūparāgādayo pañcapi catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā eva.
tika-abh06t23:18_0: Kilesesu diṭṭhivicikicchā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, doso tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, lobhamohamānathinauddhaccaahirikānottappāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t23:19_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, micchāsaṅkappo pisuṇavācā pharusavācāti ime tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, cetanāyeva cettha micchāvācāti veditabbā, samphappalāpamicchāvāyāmasatisamādhivimuttiñāṇāni catutthamaggañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t23:20_0: Lokadhammesu paṭigho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjho, yase pasaṁsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.
tika-abh06t23:22_0: Vipallāsesu pana anicce niccaṁ, anattani attāti ca saññācittadiṭṭhivipallāsā , dukkhe sukhaṁ, asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā tatiyamaggañāṇavajjhā, dukkhe sukhanti catutthamaggañāṇavajjhā.
tika-abh06t23:23_0: Ganthesu sīlabbataparāmāsaidaṁsaccābhinivesakāyaganthā paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā, byāpādakāyagantho tatiyamaggañāṇavajjho, abhijjhākāyagantho catutthamaggañāṇavajjhova.
tika-abh06t23:25_0: Āsavesu diṭṭhāsavo paṭhamañāṇavajjho, kāmāsavo tatiyañāṇavajjho, itare dve catutthañāṇavajjhā.
tika-abh06t23:26_0: Nīvaraṇesu vicikicchānīvaraṇaṁ paṭhamañāṇavajjhaṁ, kāmacchando byāpādo kukkuccanti tīṇi tatiyañāṇavajjhāni, thinamiddhauddhaccāni catutthañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t23:28_0: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṁ vatthukāmavasena ‘‘kāmā’’ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu rāgopi kāmupādāne patati, tasmā tañca kāmupādānaṁ catutthañāṇavajjhaṁ, sesāni paṭhamañāṇavajjhāni.
tika-abh06t23:29_0: Anusayesu diṭṭhivicikicchānusayā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, mānabhavarāgāvijjānusayā catutthañāṇavajjhā.
tika-abh06t23:31_0: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṁ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, pisuṇavācā pharusavācā byāpādoti tatiyañāṇavajjhā, samphappalāpo abhijjhā catutthañāṇavajjhāva.
tika-abh06t23:32_0: Akusalacittuppādesu cattāro diṭṭhigatacittuppādā, vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhā, dve paṭighasampayuttā tatiyañāṇavajjhā, sesā catutthañāṇavajjhāti.
tika-abh06t23:33_0: Yañca yena vajjhaṁ, taṁ tena pahātabbaṁ nāma.
tika-abh06t23:33_1: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘etesaṁ saṁyojanādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ etāni yathāyogaṁ pahānakarānī’’ti.
tika-abh06t23:36_0: Yo yo hi dhammo samupeti ghātaṁ;
tika-abh06t23:37_0: So so asesena ca tena tena,
tika-abh06t23:52_0: Padīpo hi yathā loke, apubbācarimaṁ idha;
tika-abh06t23:66_0: Vuttampi cetaṁ ‘‘maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṁ dukkhepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudayepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhepetaṁ ñāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapetaṁ ñāṇa’’nti.
tika-abh06t23:66_1: Tattha yathā padīpo vaṭṭiṁ jhāpeti, evaṁ maggañāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ parijānāti.
tika-abh06t23:66_2: Yathā andhakāraṁ nāseti, evaṁ samudayaṁ pajahati.
tika-abh06t23:66_3: Yathā ālokaṁ vidaṁseti, evaṁ sahajātādipaccayatāya sammāsaṅkappādimaggaṁ bhāveti.
tika-abh06t23:66_4: Yathā telaṁ pariyādiyati, evaṁ kilesapariyādānena nirodhaṁ sacchikarotīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh06t23:71_0: Obhāseti ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
tika-abh06t23:74_0: Yathā ca mahatī nāvā, apubbācarimaṁ pana;
tika-abh06t23:77_0: Jahatī orimaṁ tīraṁ, sotaṁ chindati sā pana;
tika-abh06t23:83_0: Yathā chindati taṁ sotaṁ, taṇhaṁ jahati taṁ tathā;
tika-abh06t23:84_0: Yathā vahati taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ, sahajātādinā pana.
tika-abh06t23:86_0: Tatheva paccayattena, maggaṁ bhāveti nāma so;
tika-abh06t23:87_0: Yathā pāraṁ pana evaṁ, nirodhārammaṇaṁ bhave.
